Installation
===========

SpatioloJI requires Python 3.8 or newer. You can install SpatioloJI using pip:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install SpatioloJI

For the latest development version, install directly from GitHub:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install git+https://github.com/gynecoloji/SpatioloJI.git

Dependencies
-----------

SpatioloJI mainly requires the following packages:

* numpy
* pandas
* matplotlib
* scanpy
* opencv_python
* networkx
* Shapely
* tqdm
* scikit-learn
* anndata

Additional optional dependencies:

* squidpy (for additional spatial methods)
* napari (for interactive visualization)
